primary.context: Caller immediately requested a representative upon greeting.
primary.detail: The agent initially attempted to end the call after the user said 'No' to additional help, but correctly transferred to the concierge queue after the user reiterated the request.

steps: Caller requested to speak to an agent.
Agent acknowledged the request but then asked if there was anything else.
Caller said 'No', leading the agent to attempt to end the call.
Caller repeated the request for an agent.
Agent successfully initiated the transfer to the concierge queue.

failure.detail: Agent attempted to end the call in Turn 5 despite the user's pending request for a representative.

corrections.note: User had to repeat request after agent tried to hang up.

actions.detail: Transferred caller to concierge department queue.

insights.summary: The caller requested a human agent immediately. After a brief confusion where the AI almost ended the call, the caller was successfully placed in the concierge queue.
insights.coaching: The agent should not have offered to end the call in Turn 5 when a transfer request was already in progress; it should have proceeded directly to the transfer after Turn 2.
